newsitem.title: USA: Affiliated Computer buys networking firm.
newsitem.headline: Affiliated Computer buys networking firm.

text.p: Affiliated Computer Services Inc said on Tuesday that it acquired Intelligent Solutions Inc, a Fairfax, Virginia-based network integration services company with $28 million in annual revenues.

Intelligent Solutions is the dominant provider of information technology solutions to the United States Congress and has served two successive administrations as the provider of the president's extensive correspondence management systems, Affiliated Computer said.
Steve Ristow, Intelligent Solutions's founder and chief executive officer, and his senior management team will continue to operate and manage the business after the closing.
Terms of the transaction were not disclosed.
